name: Sachin Tendulkar
description: Regarded as one of the greatest batsmen in the history of cricket. He is the highest run scorer of all time in International cricket.

name: Ricky Ponting
description: One of the most successful captains in international cricket history, under his captaincy Australia reached the top of ICC rankings.

name: Wasim Akram
description: Widely acknowledged as one of the greatest bowlers of all time. Known for his incredible swing bowling.

name: Brian Lara
description: Holds the record for the highest individual score in first-class cricket, with 501 not out for Warwickshire against Durham.
